snippet.title: OrcMassage Technical Demo
snippet.description:
Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/OrcMassage
Twitter
https://twitter.com/OrcMassage
Plurk
https://www.plurk.com/OrcMassage

Demo Download Link
https://mega.nz/#!CSojQSTQ!A7R4wuaPgtblU1xkK8JXUtpooC0Mts2vIQ0ZROqihbk

“Orc Massage” is a 3D erotic game for adults only. Player plays as the Orc masseur who gets paid by serving various kinds of female fantasy creatures. You can spend money to increase your attributes and upgrade equipments, meanwhile, you can improve abilities and job performance. Besides massage business, building a good relationship with monster girls can conduce to explore some heart-melt events.

您好，我們是Torch Studio，是位於台灣的開發團隊。
目前正在開發一款3D成人遊戲，獸人按摩店
獸人按摩店是一款結合現代與奇幻世界的經營遊戲
玩家是在按摩店工作的獸人，並且可以透過服務各種人外娘賺取所需的金錢
藉此提升設備及參數，更進一步強化自己的多項技術。
除了按摩經營以外，遊戲中也可以與人外娘交好
可以觸發更多臉紅心跳的事件讓玩家體驗哦！
